Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs! AWFUL customer service and management”
Reviews.Author: AdventuristGirl
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed night july awoke dozen swollen welts arms stripped bed found bed bugs crawling headboard pillowcases 230 morning front desk staff apathetic care move needless sleep night 6 hour drive ahead day manager found checked morning left contact information report supposedly written incident received call hotel despite messages days finally contacted corporate office fairfield inn phoenix call manager audacity offer 50 refund payment actually stay night call corporate finally refund bed bug bites month heal spent 3 hours phone receive refund 120night hotel horrible experience dont subject yourself awful treatment lack care
